t-bar.gloss: a surface lift where riders hold a bar and are pulled up the hill on their skis

t-bar lift.gloss: a surface lift where riders hold a bar and are pulled up the hill on their skis

t-bill.gloss: a short-term obligation that is not interest-bearing (it is purchased at a discount)

t.b..gloss: infection transmitted by inhalation or ingestion of tubercle bacilli and manifested in fever and small lesions (usually in the lungs but in various other parts of the body in acute stages)

tb.gloss: a metallic element of the rare earth group

tbilisi.gloss: the capital and largest city of Georgia on the Kura river
